testsuite.name: MusicAdvisorTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #2
Access token is incorrect!
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---

stdout: > auth use this link to request the access code: http://127.0.0.1:45678/authorize?client_id=f30a2058c2144488b71c0847cdc12fec&redirect_uri=http://localhost:8080&response_type=code waiting for code... test start server Tester: making requests to redirect uri: http://localhost:8080 Tester: Error: HTTP/1.1 header parser received no bytes response: 456456 ---SUCCESS--- > categories ---CATEGORIES--- Top Mood Pop
